verses.text: \w So|strong="H6213"\w* Abijah went \w to|strong="H3068"\w* rest \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* put \w him|strong="H0430"\w* into \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* town \w of|strong="H0430"\w* David, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* son became king \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* place; \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* time \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w was|strong="H3068"\w* quiet \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ten years.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* Asa did what was good \w and|strong="H4196"\w* right \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w his|strong="H5493"\w* God;

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* away \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altars \w of|strong="H0430"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* high \w places|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* upright stones broken \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wood pillars cut down;

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w go|strong="H5493"\w* after \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w keep|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* laws \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* orders.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* took \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* high places \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sun-images \w from|strong="H0776"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kingdom \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w* under \w his|strong="H3068"\w* rule.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H5437"\w* \w walled|strong="H2346"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* quiet \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* no wars \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H0428"\w* years, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5117"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1144"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* us \w make|strong="H5375"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* towns, building walls round \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w towers|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* doors \w and|strong="H3063"\w* locks. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* land \w is|strong="H3605"\w* still ours, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* true \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God; \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* true \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1144"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* given us \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* side. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H0428"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* building \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* well \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Asa \w had|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H0505"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* men \w of|strong="H0505"\w* Judah armed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* body-covers \w and|strong="H0935"\w* spears, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* eighty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w of|strong="H0505"\w* Benjamin armed \w with|strong="H0413"\w* body-covers \w and|strong="H0935"\w* bows; \w all|strong="H5704"\w* these \w were|strong="H2428"\w* men \w of|strong="H0505"\w* war.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* Zerah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Ethiopian, \w with|strong="H4421"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w army|strong="H4421"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* million, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* three hundred war-carriages, \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w forces|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* position \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* valley north \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Mareshah.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* made prayer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* only \w are|strong="H3068"\w* able \w to|strong="H3068"\w* give help \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strong \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* no strength; come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* help, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* hope \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name we \w have|strong="H3068"\w* come \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* great army. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; let not man's power \w be|strong="H3068"\w* greater than yours.

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* sent fear \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Judah; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w flight|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Asa \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Gerar|strong="H1642"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* destruction \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ethiopians \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* able \w to|strong="H1961"\w* get \w their|strong="H3605"\w* army \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w again|strong="H1961"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* broken \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* army; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* amount \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* goods.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* overcame \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* towns round Gerar, \w because|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Lord \w sent|strong="H7725"\w* fear \w on|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* goods \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* towns, \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w were|strong="H1581"\w* stores \w of|strong="H0168"\w* wealth \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.
And they made an attack on the tents of the owners of the cattle, and took away great numbers of sheep and camels and went back to Jerusalem.
